content: sts every other round until there are 32 sts left 8+16+8 then keep working the decrease round only until there are 20 or 16 sts left with n3 knit sts from n1 so that the 10 or 8 sole sts are on one needle and instep sts are on the other needle cut yarn leaving a 15 tail graft toe sts closed with kitchener stitch weave in ends copyright © 2009 mary boetcher this is a free pattern for non-commercial use only seriously ravelry name hobbit email maryb@neko com pop rocks socks page 4
